@Pontaz Download Ccleaner and run it to erase hidden files after you've uninstalled the games. Sometimes hidden files stay and don't get replaced with a reinstall. I had that problem with a Total War game which Ccleaner solved.

I'm trying to apply the latest official patch on FTM from this release. However, the patch installer doesn't recognise the game, and I'm guessing that's because this is the Steam version? 

So, I'm hoping that someone can put up the latest patch in some version compatible with this upload, or upload FTM in a non-steam version so that we can use the regular Paradox patch files.

Also, thanks a lot for this torrent! I own a lot of Paradox games, but because of their reputation for buggy releases, I sometimes prefer to try them out for free in their release state and buying them later if they get patched properly. I'd like to urge others to buy their games if you like them, since PI isn't a large developer but still support their games very well and communicate with gamers. You can often find older PI games at very good prices at www.gamersgate.com.

Hey guys. this has a little bug in it. it gives you an error message VCOMP100.DLL is missing. the solution is to google that file and get it its very simple i just copyed it into the game folder and also my windows/system folder. im not sure witch worked but i am 100% sure the game works now :) thx. hopefuly this helps someone.
